name: msgpackr-extract
author: Kris Zyp
description: Node addon for string extraction for msgpackr

scripts.prepublishOnly: cd prebuilds/win32-x64 && npm publish --otp %OTP% && cd ../darwin-x64 && npm publish --otp %OTP% && cd ../darwin-arm64 && npm publish --otp %OTP% && cd ../linux-x64 && npm publish --otp %OTP% && cd ../linux-arm64 && npm publish --otp %OTP% && cd ../.. && npm publish --otp %OTP%
